detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We prioritize relationship-building and provide tailored legal advice. We take the time to listen and understand each client's unique goals.

detailsData.title: Embracing Technology
detailsData.content: We use technology to create custom solutions for each client. This helps break down the barriers that traditional law firms often raise.

detailsData.title: Community Involvement
detailsData.content: We donate 10% of our profits to social justice nonprofits each year. Our team also volunteers time and services to several local organizations.

detailsData.title: Diversity and Inclusion
detailsData.content: We are proud to be LGBTQ+ friendly and work with nonprofits that support diversity. We believe that diversity and inclusion are key to building a strong community.

address: 21 E Carrillo St, Suite 130, Santa Barbara, CA 93101
subHeading: Professional Legal Services and Personal Connections
valueProp: Welcome to Trusted Legal, where we offer a fresh take on legal services. We pride ourselves on our agility, accessibility, and client-centered approach. We're redefining the traditional law firm experience. Our philosophy is built on the belief that the best results come from partnering with our clients, prioritizing relationship-building, and providing tailored legal advice.

testimonalData.text: You are a rockstar and I would not have wanted to go through litigation with anybody else. I appreciate everything about you!
testimonalData.author: C-Suite Employee

testimonalData.text: At every step of the process, I was not only treated with respect as a client, Naomi also made me feel that she was personally involved with my concerns.
testimonalData.author: Government employee

testimonalData.text: Naomi’s ability to focus on the long game for our business has made our company stronger. With her help we made changes to our business model that allowed us to remain legally compliant as well as profitable.
testimonalData.author: Award winning business owner
